vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 2Ch.28.12;
son of: Shallum (H7967N)
§ Hezekiah or Jehizkiah = "Jehovah has made strong"
1) son of king Ahazby Abi or Abijah and the 12th king of Judah; his reign was characterised by his godly conduct; reigned for 29 years
2) head of a family of returning exiles in the time of Nehemiah
3) an Ephraimite in the time of Ahaz
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a) יְחִזְקִיָּהוּ ,חִזְקִיָּהוּ ,חִזְקִיָּה   hijo de Ahaz; rey de Judá (716/15-687/86); (b) חִזְקִיָּה   jefe de familia; post exílico ; (a) יְחִזְקִיָּה ,חִזְקִיָּהוּ ,חִזְקִיָּה   hijo de Ahaz; rey de Judá (716/15-687/86); (b)   hijo de Salum; jefe; tribu de Efraín; en tiempos de Ahaz
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
希西家 或 耶希西家 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "耶和華已使剛強"
1) (猶大)王亞哈斯與亞的兒子, 是猶大第12位國王; 他的統治以神的帶領為特徵;
統治29年 (見[02396] 此處的名字原文拼法不同)
2) 尼希米時期一個被擄歸回家族之首 (拉 2:16)
3) 亞哈斯時期的一個以法蓮人 (代下28:12)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
希西家 或 耶希西家 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "耶和华已使刚强"
1) (犹大)王亚哈斯与亚的儿子, 是犹大第12位国王; 他的统治以神的带领为特征;
统治29年 (见[02396] 此处的名字原文拼法不同)
2) 尼希米时期一个被掳归回家族之首 (拉 2:16)
3) 亚哈斯时期的一个以法莲人 (代下28:12)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A king of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Ki.16.20;
son of: Ahaz (H0271) and Abi (H0021);
brother of: Maaseiah (H4641J); married to Hephzibah (H2657);
father of: Manasseh (H4519H)
Another spelling of chiz.qiy.yah (חִזְקִיָּהוּ "Hezekiah" H2396)
§ Hezekiah or Jehizkiah = "Jehovah has made strong"
1) son of king Ahazby Abi or Abijah and the 12th king of Judah; his reign was characterised by his godly conduct; reigned for 29 years
2) head of a family of returning exiles in the time of Nehemiah
3) an Ephraimite in the time of Ahaz

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Ezr.2.16;
son of: Ater (H0333)
Another spelling of chiz.qiy.yah (חִזְקִיָּהוּ "Hezekiah" H2396I)
§ Hezekiah or Jehizkiah = "Jehovah has made strong"
1) son of king Ahazby Abi or Abijah and the 12th king of Judah; his reign was characterised by his godly conduct; reigned for 29 years
2) head of a family of returning exiles in the time of Nehemiah
3) an Ephraimite in the time of Ahaz
